mapper.sql: MARKETER_NO, MARKETER_NAME, DEP_CODE, DEP_NAME, PERSONNEL_DIVISION, STATUS, ENTRY_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, ALLOCATION_PROPORTION, MARKETER_LEVEL, CERT_NO, TELEPHONE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CERT_TYPE, BIRETHDAY
mapper.insert: insert into T_CRM_MARKETER (MARKETER_NO, MARKETER_NAME, DEP_CODE, DEP_NAME, PERSONNEL_DIVISION, STATUS, ENTRY_DATE, LEAVE_DATE, ALLOCATION_PROPORTION, MARKETER_LEVEL, CERT_NO, TELEPHONE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CERT_TYPE, BIRETHDAY) values (#{marketerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personnelDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leaveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allocationProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketerLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birethday,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

MARKETER_NO,
MARKETER_NAME,

BIRETHDAY,

mapper.update:
update T_CRM_MARKETER
MARKETER_NAME = #{marketerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEP_CODE = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEP_NAME = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSONNEL_DIVISION = #{personnelDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAVE_DATE = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLOCATION_PROPORTION = #{allocationProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKETER_LEVEL = #{marketerLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRETHDAY = #{birethday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MARKETER_NO = #{marketerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CRM_MARKETER set MARKETER_NAME = #{marketerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEP_CODE = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEP_NAME = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSONNEL_DIVISION = #{personnelDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEAVE_DATE = #{leaveDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLOCATION_PROPORTION = #{allocationProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKETER_LEVEL = #{marketerLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRETHDAY = #{birethday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MARKETER_NO = #{marketerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from (select case when sum < 50000 then '0.08' when sum >= 50000 and sum < 100000 then '0.1' when sum >= 100000 and sum < 200000 then '0.12' when sum >= 200000 then '0.15' end as marketerRate from T_REPORT_MARKETER_REWARD where MARKETER_NO = #{0} order by REPORT_MONTH desc) where ROWNUM = 1
